data.title: Doo Wop Shoo Bop Various Artist CDs by Title
data.meta_description:
Doo Wop Shoo Bop various artist cd page. Each entry includes 
cd title, track listing and brief description.
data.text:
SOUND OF THE CITY

In the late 1950s, just as doo-wop began to fade, it was taken up by mostly Italian American groups in New York and New Jersey. Their teenage sonatas echoed their lives and loves. Some were nationwide hits, some were local hits and some are now rare collectors' items. This set includes Dion's unreleased 1st recording from 1956. 3 CD set - 59 tracks.

STARRY-EYED SERENADERS

Romance has been the overriding preoccupation of songwriters and performers through the ages, and never more so than in the golden years of rock & roll. On Starry-Eyed Serenaders, music historian and producer Stuart Colman has intertwined an array of love songs, some famous, many much sought after, that together assert what the classic make-out ballad is all about. 2 CD set - 50 tracks. Limited quantity.

STEREO DOO WOP - Volume 1

25 great stereo doo wop cuts...as you've never heard them before! Includes many alternate takes and mixes. Listen to the Eternals, Continental Five, Jarmels, Turbans and many others. 25 tracks.

STEREO DOO WOP - Volume 2

Another volume of 25 great stereo doo wop cuts...as you've never heard them before! Includes many alternate takes and mixes. Listen to the Penguins, Mystics, Del-Satins, Elegants and many others. 25 tracks.

STEREO DOO WOP - Volume 3

Another volume of 25 great stereo doo wop cuts...as you've never heard them before! Includes many alternate takes and mixes. Listen to the Channels, Halos, Cordials, Visuals and many others. With sound clips! 25 tracks.

STEREO DOO WOP - Volume 4

Another volume of 25 great stereo doo wop cuts...as you've never heard them before! Includes many alternate takes and mixes. Listen to the Upfronts, Dreamers, Elegants, Visions and many others. With sound clips! 25 tracks.

STEREO DOO WOP - Volume 5

Another volume of 25 great stereo doo wop cuts...as you've never heard them before! Includes many alternate takes and mixes. Listen to the Scarlets, Calendars, Videls, Skyliners, Visions, Harptones and many others. With sound clips! 25 tracks.

STEREO DOO WOP - Volume 6

Another volume of 25 great stereo doo wop cuts...as you've never heard them before! Includes many alternate takes and mixes. Listen to the Mello-Kings, Videls, Earls, Chiffons and many others. With sound clips! 25 tracks.

STEREO DOO WOP - Volume 7

Another volume of 25 great stereo doo wop cuts...as you've never heard them before! Includes many alternate takes and mixes. Listen to the Camerons, Clickettes, Four Epics, Corsairs and many others. With sound clips! 25 tracks.

STEREO DOO WOP - Volume 8

Another volume of 25 great stereo doo wop cuts...as you've never heard them before! Includes many alternate takes and mixes. Listen to the Statens, Impalas, Genies, Cordials and many others. With sound clips! 25 tracks.

STEREO DOO WOP - Volume 9

Another volume of 25 great stereo doo wop cuts...as you've never heard them before! Includes many alternate takes and mixes. Listen to the Genies, Classics, Essex, Marcels and many others. With sound clips! 25 tracks.

STILL ON TOP WITH DOO WOP - Volume 1

25 great doo wop tracks, with 10 being previously released, show that doo wop is still on top! With sound clips! 25 tracks.

STILL ON TOP WITH DOO WOP - Volume 2

25 great doo wop tracks, with 14 being previously released, show that doo wop is still on top! 25 tracks.

STILL ON TOP WITH DOO WOP - Volume 3

25 great doo wop tracks, with 13 being previously released, show that doo wop is still on top! 25 tracks.

STREET CORNER ROMANCE - Volume 1

Street corner doo wopping leads to 'street corner romance'. Features the Pastels, Dubs, 5 Keys, Ascots & many others. See track listing + 4 surprise bonus tracks.

STREET CORNER ROMANCE - Volume 2

Volume 2 of the series; Street corner doo wopping leads to 'street corner romance'. Features the Concepts, Dreams, Deltas, Uniques & many others. 24 tracks.

STREET CORNER ROMANCE - Volume 3

Volume 3 of the series; Street corner doo wopping leads to 'street corner romance'. Features the Darts, Cordials, 5 Peaks, Tokens & many others. 24 tracks.

STREET CORNER ROMANCE - Volume 4

Volume 4 of the series; Street corner doo wopping leads to 'street corner romance'. Features the Climbers, Rodans, Swallows, Hi-Lites, Toppers & many others. 24 tracks.

STREET STUFF - Volume 1

Street Stuff volume 1 includes rare & 15 unreleased songs by the Cashmeres, Emotions, Roulettes, Criterions and many other groups. With sound clips. 25 tracks.

STREET STUFF - Volume 2

Street Stuff volume 2 includes more rare & 15 unreleased songs by the Clovers, Chimes, Escos, Vice-Roys and many other groups. With sound clips. 25 tracks.

SUMMERTIME DOO-WOP

Summertime doo-wops - 32 of the hottest doo-wop rarities - all featuring summer! 32 tracks.

Super Rare Doo-Wops - Volume 1

Get ready for some 'super rare' doo-wops featuring the Pyramiders, Larks, Tone Blenders, Hi Tones, Swinging Hearts and other groups. 30 tracks.

Super Rare Doo-Wops - Volume 2

Get ready for some more 'super rare' doo-wops featuring the By Standers, Charts, Four Knights, Blue Dots, Electronaires and others. 30 tracks.

Super Rare Doo-Wops - Volume 3

Get ready for some 'super rare' doo-wops featuring the Fabulous Fanatics, Flaming Hearts, Little John & the Sherwoods, Sonnettes and other groups. 30 tracks.

Super Rare Doo-Wops - Volume 4

Get ready for some 'super rare' doo-wops featuring the Bachelors, Voice Masters, Golden Nuggets, Melvettes and other groups. 30 tracks.

SYMPHONY SID - Jumpin' With

Symphony Sid's slections of the month are all jumpin'! 25 tracks.

SUNDAY KIND OF LOVE

One of the all time greatest doo wop songs 'Sunday Kind of Love' - performed by 24 different artists! 24 tracks.

TEEN AGE GOODIES

'You're Never Too Old For Doo Wop Gold!' 26 great tracks that includes favorites by the Schoolboys, Themes, Billy Ward & Dominoes, Diablos, Quotations & many more!

TEEN BEAT - Hip Chicks and Hot Mamas

All the hip chicks and hot mamas are on this great CD. Includes Brenda Lee, Ann Cole, Rose Maddox and many more. 26 tracks.

TEEN DREAMS - 60 Peachy-Keen Pop Gems From The Pre-Beat Era

Featuring some of the biggest names of the pre-British Invasion era, the Lucky Parker-compiled 2CD set Teen Dreams includes hits from one-time rockabilly Johnny Burnette swapping primal yelps for swooping strings, Gidget heart-throb James Darren, American Bandstand idols Fabian, Bobby Rydell and Frankie Avalon, pop princess Connie Francis, former Mouseketeer and beach party icon Annette, Joanie Sommers (77 Sunset Strip) and Hawaiian Eyes Connie Stevens, together with a wealth of lesser-heard teeners: Jimmy Beaumont, Dick Glasser, Barry Mann, The Casals, Bobby Curtola and Presley soundalike Ral Donner. Also included is an early offering from Gene Pitney and Ginny Arnell (as Jamie & Jane) together with the original versions of two songs covered by Blightys own Billy Fury, A Fools Memory aka Running Around (Ricky Shaw) and A King For Tonight (Barry Darvell), plus Linda Scotts charming cover of A Thousand Stars, also a hit for Fury in 1960. Recollecting those carefree days of high school rings and letter sweaters, Shelley Fabares, Johnny Tillotson, Paul & Paula and Jerry Keller complement our selection with four chart-topping singles. 2 CD set - 60 tracks. Limited quantity.

TEEN IDOLS

Over 50 original hits from all your teen idols - Paul Anka, Bobby Vee, Ricky Nelson, Eddie Cochran, Buddy Holly and so many more. 2 CD set - 52 tracks. Limited quantity.

TEENAGE DOO-WOP JAMBOREE

Teenage doo-wop jamboree for all ages! Includes tracks by the Stereos, Sharps, Vocal Lords, Ideals and many others. 30 tracks.

TEENAGE PARTY

All the hits that were played at a Teenage Party. Features the Cleftones Little Girl of Mine, the Harptones A Sunday Kind of Love, plus tracks by the Wrens, Valentines & Crows. 12 original recordings on one great CD.

TEENAGE PARTY - Volume 1

Having a party with all these great tracks! Features 'Why Did You Go', 'Over the Summer', 'First Star' and many more! 22 tracks.

TEXAS' BEST & RAREST DOO WOP VOLUME 2

Volume 2 - features the best & rarest doo wop from the Lone Star state. Includes tracks by the Royal Jesters, Delcades, Blue Angels, Montclairs & many others. 30 tracks.

THAT CALIFORNIA SOUND: The Risers, The Weird-ohs, The Surf Nuts

That California sound - motorcycles, hot rods & surf....The Risers, The Weird-Ohs & the Jack Marshall Band! 30 tracks.

THE NIGHT HAS A THOUSAND SOUNDALIKES - 60s Teen Pop Influenced by Bobby Vee

The Night Has A Thousand Soundalikes is the first ever collection of 60s teen idols who aspired to mimic the iconic Bobby Vee Sound. Expect high quality production, short poppy songs, double-tracked vocals and lots of fun. Loaded with 35 tracks featuring a fully annotated 24 page colour booklet. Artists include Tobin Matthews, Alan Vallone, Brad Newman, The Crickets and many more! 35 tracks.

THERE IS A THIN RED LINE BETWEEN DOOWOP & SOUL

You be the judge - doowop or soul! Which side of the 'thin red line' are you on? Artists featured include Alteers, Dundees, Four Grand, Chancellors & others. 24 tracks.

THEY SANG IN PITTSBURGH - Volume 1

The 1990s LP is released on CD with many extra bonus cuts. This 27 various artist package includes 5 songs previously unreleased by some of Pittsburghs finest. 27 tracks.

THEY SANG ON EVERY CORNER (From the Vaults) - Volume 1

Back in the day, every corner was occupied by singers! So from the vaults here are 25 tracks (24 previously unrelaesed) from groups that did sing on the corner...every one they could find. 25 tracks. With sound clips

THEY SANG ON EVERY CORNER (From the Vaults) - Volume 2

Back in the day, every corner was occupied by singers! So from the vaults here are 25 tracks (ALL previously unrelaesed) from groups that did sing on the corner...every one they could find. 25 tracks. With sound clips

THEY SANG ON THE CORNER IN THE BRONX - Volume 1

The Heartbreakers, Nino & Ebbtides, Eternals, Four Blades and many other - they sang on the corner in the Bronx. 27 tracks - 10 previously unreleased.

THEY SANG ON THE CORNER IN THE BRONX - Volume 2

The Chantels, Personalities, Dion & Belmonts and many other - they sang on the corner in the Bronx. 27 tracks - 9 previously unreleased.

THEY SANG ON THE CORNER IN THE BRONX - Volume 3

The Treble Chords, Earls, Juveniles, Wrens and many other - they sang on the corner in the Bronx. 27 tracks - 9 previously unreleased.

THEY SANG ON THE CORNER IN LONG ISLAND - Volume 1

The Imaginations, Four Pages, Sunbeams, Rendezvous and many other - they sang on the corner on Long Island. 27 tracks - 6 previously unreleased.

THEY SANG ON THE CORNER IN LONG ISLAND - Volume 2

The Four Directions, Chancellors, Fabulous Pearl Devines, Nick & the Nacks and many other - they sang on the corner on Long Island. 27 tracks - 5 previously unreleased.

THEY SANG ON THE CORNER IN MANHATTAN - Volume 1

The Charters, Legends, Diamonds, Teenagers and many other - they sang on the corner in Manhattan. 27 tracks - 5 previously unreleased.

THEY SANG ON THE CORNER IN MANHATTAN - Volume 2

The Desires, Chevrons, Minors and many other - they sang on the corner in Manhattan. 27 tracks - 5 previously unreleased.

THEY SANG ON THE CORNER IN MANHATTAN - Volume 3

The 5 Reasons, Townsmen, Charters and many other - they sang on the corner in Manhattan. 27 tracks - 4 previously unreleased.

THEY SANG ON THE CORNER IN NEW JERSEY - Volume 1

The Sonics, Ideals, Concept's Ray & Darchaes and many other - they sang on the corner in New Jrsey. 27 tracks - 2 previously unreleased.

THEY SANG ON THE CORNER IN NEW JERSEY - Volume 2

The Ocapellos, Duprees, Hi-Fives, Avons and many other - they sang on the corner in New Jrsey. 27 tracks - 3 previously unreleased.

THEY SANG ON THE CORNER IN NEW JERSEY - Volume 3

The Starletts, V-Eights, Vibes, Joey Dee & Starliters and many other - they sang on the corner in New Jrsey. 27 tracks - 3 previously unreleased.

THEY SANG ON THE CORNER IN NEW JERSEY - Volume 4

The Notations, Parliments, Ducanes, Serenaders and many other - they sang on the corner in New Jrsey. 27 tracks - 4 previously unreleased.

THEY SANG ON THE CORNER IN QUEENS - Volume 1

Direct from the corner in Queens, New York...featuring the Heartbeats, Rivaleers, Videos and many others. 11 previously unreleased tracks. 28 tracks.

THEY SANG ON THE CORNER IN QUEENS - Volume 2

Direct from the corner in Queens, New York...featuring the Larktones, Devotions, Exciters and many others. 10 previously unreleased tracks. 27 tracks.

THEY SANG ON THE CORNER IN QUEENS - Volume 3

Direct from the corner in Queens, New York...featuring the Gothics, Chanters, Capris and many others. 7 previously unreleased tracks. 27 tracks.

THEY SANG ON THE CORNER OUTSIDE THE CITY LIMITS

On the outside of the city limits, they were singing on the corner....the Sinceres, Mello-Kings, Del-Rays and many others. 27 tracks - 4 previously unreleased.

THEY SANG IN PITTSBURGH - Volume 2

27 various artist tracks with 15 previously unreleased sides from groups that came out of the Pittsburgh area. 27 tracks.

THEY SANG IN PITTSBURGH - Volume 3

This third volume in this series contains 27 tracks with 12 previously unreleased sides. 27 tracks.

THEY SANG IN PITTSBURGH - Volume 4

27 tracks including 10 previously unreleased sides. 27 tracks.

THEY SANG IN PITTSBURGH - Volume 5

27 tracks including 10 previously unreleased sides. 27 tracks.

THEY SANG ON THE CORNER IN BROOKLYN - Volume 1

The Chesters, Illusions, Shy-Tones, Demolyrs and many other - they sang on the corner in Brooklyn. 28 tracks.

THEY SANG ON THE CORNER IN BROOKLYN - Volume 2

The Sinceres, Catalinas, Adelphis, Bay Bops and many other - they sang on the corner in Brooklyn. 28 tracks.

THEY SANG ON THE CORNER IN BROOKLYN - Volume 3

The Tokens, Speedo & the Impalas, Camelots, Medidians and many other - they sang on the corner in Brooklyn. 28 tracks.

THEY SANG ON THE CORNER IN BROOKLYN - Volume 4

The Lanes, Velvet Keys, Untouchables, Encounters and many other - they sang on the corner in Brooklyn. 28 tracks.

THEY SANG ON THE CORNER IN STATEN ISLAND - Volume 1

From Staten Island....25 tracks; 5 previously unreleased by great Staten Island groups! Includes tracks by the Expressions, Hall Brothers, 5 Secrets and many others. 25 tracks.

THEY SANG ON THE CORNER IN STATEN ISLAND - Volume 2

From Staten Island....25 tracks; 6 previously unreleased by great Staten Island groups! Includes tracks by the Infascinations, Casualaires, Loungers and many others. 25 tracks.

THIS LOVE WAS REAL - LA Vocal Groups 1959-1964

Explore the later years of Los Angeles' doo wop scene from sources that have never previously been digitalized from master tapes. We have found master tapes of very rare and expensive doo wop recordings in the vaults of Doré, Era, Gary Paxton, Kent Harris and George Motola in particular. Features previously unheard songs and extensive liner notes from LA vocal group expert Steve Propes. 24 tracks. With sound clips!

THOSE DOO-WOP ANSWER SONGS - Volume 2

The answers to your favorite hit doo-wop songs. 25 tracks.

THOSE ROCK N ROLL ANSWER SONGS - Volume 3

Every question has an answer....and almost every rock n roll song has an answer too! Volume 3 of a series. 26 tracks.

THOSE ROCK N ROLL ANSWER SONGS - Volume 4

Every question has an answer....and almost every rock n roll song has an answer too! Volume 4 of a series. 26 tracks.

THOSE ROCK N ROLL ANSWER SONGS - Volume 5

Every question has an answer....and almost every rock n roll song has an answer too! Volume 5 of a series. 26 tracks.

THOSE ROCK N ROLL ANSWER SONGS - Volume 6

Every question has an answer....and almost every rock n roll song has an answer too! Volume 6 of a series. 26 tracks.

THOSE WONDERFUL YEARS - Love Me Tender

Those wonderful years of great music - relive them with this wonderful CD of all your favorites! 15 tracks.

THOSE WONDERFUL YEARS - April Love

Those wonderful years of great music - relive them with this wonderful CD of all your favorites! 15 tracks.

TINY TOPSY AND FRIENDS

Tiny Topsy performs alone and then with some friends......Big Maybelle, Jeannette Baker, Rosetta Perry and others. 32 tracks.

TOAST OF THE COAST - Vol 2

Two dozen more slabs of quality 1950's R&B from John Dolphin's house of hits. 17 tracks previously unreleased. 24 tracks.
